<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ProblemRelatedListChangeRequestItemFilter</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Overrides the default getFilterQuery in "global.RelatedListItemCandidateFilter" to show lists of change requests in the modal of Agent Workspace for Problem.</description> <name>ProblemRelatedListChangeRequestItemFilter</name> <script><![CDATA[var ProblemRelatedListChangeRequestItemFilter = Class.create(); ProblemRelatedListChangeRequestItemFilter.prototype = { getFilterQuery: function() { return "active=true^parentISEMPTY"; },
handles: function(thing) { return thing == "PROBLEM_CHANGE_REQUEST_QUERY_FILTER"; },
type: 'ProblemRelatedListChangeRequestItemFilter' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-08-18 07:34:06</sys_created_on> <sys_id>31fbd50053b210107b77ddeeff7b1287</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ProblemRelatedListChangeRequestItemFilter</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Problem Management Best Practice - Madrid" source="com.snc.best_practice.problem.madrid">42d4c5836de620100acb70b353433053</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_31fbd50053b210107b77ddeeff7b1287</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-08-27 13:59:25</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>363</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
